abstract: Some studies suggest the Obama administration should reconsider stimulus policy that favors government spending over tax cuts.
snippet: Some studies suggest the Obama administration should reconsider stimulus policy that favors government spending over tax cuts.
lead_paragraph: IMAGINE you are a physician and a patient arrives in your office with a troubling and mysterious disease. Some of the symptoms are familiar, but others are not. You have never treated anyone with quite this set of problems.

headline.main: Tax Cuts Might Accomplish What Spending Hasn’t
headline.print_headline: Tax Cuts Might Accomplish What Spending Hasn’t
